attributes.action: stop using public sector employees as a political pawn and to award a pay increase across the entire public sector in line with inflation, and to increase pay annually in line with inflation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister is penalising public sector staff in order to combat inflation. People employed in the private sector face no such penalty. This is unfair and unreasonable. 

The same argument happens every year and could be avoided if public sector pay rose in line with inflation using the indices compiled by the Government.
